languages.text: {n}Маражай обращает взгляд к вам. На его лице блуждает довольная ухмылка.{/n} "С меня хватило этого булыжника, {name}. Вернемся на корабль. Как только соберем трофеи. Позже... я перемолвлюсь с тобой парой слов".

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай обращает взгляд к вам. На его лице блуждает довольная ухмылка.{/n} "С меня довольно этого булыжника, {name}. Вернемся на корабль. Сейчас".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai turns his gaze on you, a satisfied grin adorning his face.{/n} "I have had enough of this rock, {name}. Let us go back to the ship as soon as we collect our trophies. Later... you and I will have a talk."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай обращает взгляд к вам. На его лице блуждает довольная ухмылка.{/n} "С меня хватило этого булыжника, {name}. Вернемся на корабль. Как только соберем трофеи. Позже... я перемолвлюсь с тобой парой слов".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai turns his gaze to you, a satisfied grin haunting his face.{/n} "I have had enough of this rock, {name}. Let us go back to the ship as soon as we collect the trophies. Later... You and I are going to have a talk."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai turns his gaze on you, a satisfied grin adorning his face.{/n} "I have had enough of this rock, {name}. Let us go back to the ship as soon as we collect our trophies. Later... you and I will have a talk."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai richtet seinen Blick auf dich und grinst zufrieden.{/n} "Ich habe genug von diesem Felsen, {name}. Kehren wir aufs Schiff zurück, sobald wir unsere Trophäen eingesammelt haben. Und später ... unterhalten wir beide uns."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns his gaze on you, a satisfied grin adorning his face.{/n} "I have had enough of this rock, {name}. Let us go back to the ship as soon as we collect our trophies. Later... you and I will have a talk."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai richtet seinen Blick auf dich und grinst zufrieden.{/n} "Ich habe genug von diesem Felsen, {name}. Kehren wir aufs Schiff zurück, sobald wir unsere Trophäen eingesammelt haben. Und später ... unterhalten wir beide uns."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋将目光转向你，脸上露出满意的笑容。{/n}“这块破石头我已经不想呆了，{name}。等我们搜刮完战利品之后就回船上去吧，之后……我要和你好好谈谈。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns his gaze on you, a satisfied grin adorning his face.{/n} "I have had enough of this rock, {name}. Let us go back to the ship as soon as we collect our trophies. Later... you and I will have a talk."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋将目光转向你，脸上露出满意的笑容。{/n}“这块破石头我已经不想呆了，{name}。等我们搜刮完战利品之后就回船上去吧，之后……我要和你好好谈谈。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai vous regarde, un sourire satisfait aux lèvres.{/n} « J'en ai assez de ce caillou, {name}. Retournons à bord du navire dès que nous aurons récupéré nos trophées. Et après... vous et moi allons discuter. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns his gaze on you, a satisfied grin adorning his face.{/n} "I have had enough of this rock, {name}. Let us go back to the ship as soon as we collect our trophies. Later... you and I will have a talk."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai vous regarde, un sourire satisfait aux lèvres.{/n} « J'en ai assez de ce caillou, {name}. Retournons à bord du navire dès que nous aurons récupéré nos trophées. Et après... vous et moi allons discuter. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se gira hacia ti con una sonrisa satisfecha.{/n} «Me he hartado de este peñasco, {name}. Volvamos a la nave en cuanto recojamos nuestros trofeos. Y luego... vamos a hablar en serio».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns his gaze on you, a satisfied grin adorning his face.{/n} "I have had enough of this rock, {name}. Let us go back to the ship as soon as we collect our trophies. Later... you and I will have a talk."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se gira hacia ti con una sonrisa satisfecha.{/n} «Me he hartado de este peñasco, {name}. Volvamos a la nave en cuanto recojamos nuestros trofeos. Y luego... vamos a hablar en serio».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは満足げな笑みを顔に浮かべ、視線をあなたに向ける。{/n}「ここにはもううんざりだ、{name}。戦利品を集めたらすぐに船へ戻ろう。あとで…話がある」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns his gaze on you, a satisfied grin adorning his face.{/n} "I have had enough of this rock, {name}. Let us go back to the ship as soon as we collect our trophies. Later... you and I will have a talk."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは満足げな笑みを顔に浮かべ、視線をあなたに向ける。{/n}「ここにはもううんざりだ、{name}。戦利品を集めたらすぐに船へ戻ろう。あとで…話がある」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, yüzünde tatmin olmuş bir sırıtışla bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Bu kaya parçasından sıkıldım {name}. Ganimetlerimizi toplar toplamaz gemiye dönelim. Sonra da... Konuşmamız gerekecek."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns his gaze on you, a satisfied grin adorning his face.{/n} "I have had enough of this rock, {name}. Let us go back to the ship as soon as we collect our trophies. Later... you and I will have a talk."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, yüzünde tatmin olmuş bir sırıtışla bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Bu kaya parçası yetti bana artık {name}. Ganimetlerimizi toplar toplamaz gemiye dönelim. Sonra da... İkimizin konuşması gerekecek."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
